languages.text: {n}Церемония подходит к концу — клятвы даны, а чело каждого офицера отмечено касанием исповедника. Наступает момент завершающей молитвы.{/n}
{n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Церемония подходит к концу — клятвы даны, а чело каждого офицера отмечено касанием исповедника. Наступает момент завершающей молитвы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeremonie kommt zum Ende. Gelübde werden abgelegt, und der Konfessor berührt jeden Offizier auf der Stirn. Der Zeitpunkt für das abschließende Gebet ist gekommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeremonie kommt zum Ende. Gelübde werden abgelegt, und der Konfessor berührt jeden Offizier auf der Stirn. Der Zeitpunkt für das abschließende Gebet ist gekommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La ceremonia toca a su fin. Los votos se han pronunciado y el confesor ha tocado la frente de todos los oficiales. Ha llegado el momento de la plegaria final.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La ceremonia toca a su fin. Los votos se han pronunciado y el confesor ha tocado la frente de todos los oficiales. Ha llegado el momento de la plegaria final.{/n}

languages.text: {n}式典は終わりを告げる。誓約の言葉を述べて、すべての士官の額に聴罪師が触れた。そして閉会の祈りが捧げられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}式典は終わりを告げる。誓約の言葉を述べて、すべての士官の額に聴罪師が触れた。そして閉会の祈りが捧げられる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}仪式结束了，所有人宣誓完毕。告解神父触碰了每位军官的额头，最后的祷告马上就要开始了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}仪式结束了，所有人宣誓完毕。告解神父触碰了每位军官的额头，最后的祷告马上就要开始了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cérémonie s'achève. Les vœux sont prononcés et le front de chaque officier est gratifié d'un frôlement du confesseur. L'heure est maintenant à la prière de clôture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cérémonie s'achève. Les vœux sont prononcés et le front de chaque officier est gratifié d'un frôlement du confesseur. L'heure est maintenant à la prière de clôture.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tören sona eriyor. Antlar içiliyor. Tüm subayların alnı, günah çıkarıcının dokunuşuyla kutsanıyor. Artık sıra kapanış duasına geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ceremony comes to an end. The vows are given and the forehead of every officer is graced with the touch of the confessor. Now comes the moment for the closing prayer.{/n}
